column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm probably breaking an unwritten rule by writing this review but I don't see what all the hubbub is about. I think my expectations were too high. Our pie was good
column2: not great. There was way too much cheese on it
column3: so much that I had to take about half off and it was still plenty. I did like the ability to order online. I was on my way to Midway to catch a flight and didn't have time to order onsite. As promised
column4: the food was ready on time.
